--- bad_select.sql
select

--- Error
syntax error: testdata/input/query/bad_select.sql:2:1: unexpected token: <eof>

  2:  
      ^


--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BadNode{
          NodePos: 7,
          NodeEnd: 7,
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT
